project.name: Dasa Mahavidya: The Ten Great Wisdoms
project.label: Astrokiran / Independent
project.album_description: Explore the complete, primordial power of the Divine Mother in 'Dasa Mahavidya: The Ten Great Wisdoms,' an original musical series from Astrokiran. This collection is a profound spiritual journey through the ten faces of Shakti, from the fierce protective energy of Kali to the abundant bliss of Kamala. Unlike any other mantra collection, this work is presented in its authentic Tantric form: a powerful, percussive Sanskrit chant set against a hypnotic, low-frequency meditative drone.

playlist.title: Dasa Mahavidya: The Ten Great Wisdoms (Complete Tantric Chant Collection by Astrokiran)
playlist.alternative_title: The 10 Mahavidyas: Complete Sanskrit Chants (Deep Drone Meditation Series by Astrokiran)

standard_description_block.about_project: This track is part of the 'Dasa Mahavidya: The Ten Great Wisdoms' collection, a musical series by Astrokiran. The project explores the ten fundamental faces of the Divine Mother through powerful, authentic Sanskrit chants set against a deep, meditative drone.
standard_description_block.about_artist: Astrokiran is a musician and spiritual practitioner dedicated to bringing the authentic wisdom of Vedic and Tantric philosophy to life through music, articles, and spiritual guidance.

tracks.theological_identity: The Dark Goddess of Time and Death
tracks.youtube_title: Mahakali Mantra for Protection & Transformation | Deep Tantric Percussive Chant | Kali
tracks.youtube_description:
Invoke the power of Mahakali with this powerful, deep Tantric chant. This mantra is a shield of protection, designed to remove negative energy, destroy obstacles, and clear the path for profound spiritual transformation.

Kali, the first of the Dasa Mahavidyas, is the Dark Goddess of Time (Kala), Death, and Change. She is the ultimate, primordial power who destroys ego, ignorance, and illusion to reveal the light of pure consciousness. This fierce yet compassionate chant invokes her protective, motherly aspect to guide you through darkness.

This musical piece is a hypnotic, percussive Sanskrit chant, reflecting Kali's fierce, active energy. It is set against a low, sustained drone that represents the eternal, unchanging nature of Time (Kala) itself.

#KaliMantra #Mahakali #GoddessKali #MantraForProtection #TantricChant #Sanskrit

tracks.theological_identity: The Guide Who Helps Cross Over (Neel Saraswati)
tracks.youtube_title: Tara Mantra (Neel Saraswati) for Wisdom, Speech & Guidance | Deep Sanskrit Chant | Mahavidya
tracks.youtube_description:
Cross the ocean of illusion and invoke divine wisdom with this powerful chant to Goddess Tara. As the 'Tantric' or 'Neel Saraswati', this mantra is a potent tool for students, artists, and speakers, bestowing success in education, sharp memory, and powerful, compassionate speech.

Tara is the second Mahavidya, the Savior and Guide. She is the ultimate power of the word, the pranava, who helps us cross over all dangers and ignorance. This chant invokes her power as Nila Saraswati, the fierce form of knowledge who cuts through confusion.

This piece features a strong, rhythmic, and percussive vocal performance, embodying the very essence of Divine Speech (Vak). The clear, resonant chant is designed to activate the throat chakra and enhance clarity of expression.

#TaraMantra #NeelSaraswati #GoddessTara #MantraForWisdom #SanskritChant #Mahavidya

tracks.theological_identity: The Beautiful Goddess of the Three Worlds
tracks.file_note: Two versions with different spellings and different content (different MD5 hashes)
tracks.youtube_title: Tripura Sundari Mantra (Shodashi) for Divine Beauty & Bliss | Shri Vidya Chant | Lalita
tracks.youtube_description:
Experience profound bliss and divine beauty with this hypnotic Sanskrit chant to Tripura Sundari (Shodashi), the Queen of the Three Worlds. This mantra is a core chant of the Shri Vidya tradition, invoking supreme consciousness and filling the practitioner's life with peace, harmony, and abundance.

Tripura Sundari, also known as Lalita, is the third Mahavidya and the 'Beauty of the Three Worlds.' She represents the ultimate reality and the source of all beauty and bliss. This meditation is an offering to her, the Adi Mahavidya.

The music features a deep, meditative drone that creates a peaceful, sacred space, while the rhythmic Sanskrit chant invokes the 'play' (Lila) of the goddess. This track is ideal for Shri Vidya practitioners and deep meditation.

#TripuraSundari #Shodashi #ShriVidya #LalitaMantra #TantricChant #DivineBeauty

tracks.youtube_title: Bhuvaneshwari Mantra (Hreem) | Chant to the Goddess of Space & Consciousness | Deep Drone Meditation
tracks.youtube_description:
Expand your consciousness and connect to the infinite with this profound meditation on Bhuvaneshwari, the Divine Goddess of Space. This chant uses the powerful Bija Mantra 'Hreem' to align your heart-space with the cosmic space of the universe.

Bhuvaneshwari, the fourth Mahavidya, is the 'Queen of the Universe'. She is not in space; she is the space—the Akasha—the field of pure consciousness in which all worlds, all beings, and all possibilities are held.

This track is a pure, deep, low-frequency drone meditation. The sustained, resonant drone is the sound of Bhuvaneshwari's infinite, empty-full void. The gentle, percussive Sanskrit chant is the creative impulse (Shakti) manifesting within that space. Ideal for deep meditation, relaxation, and expanding awareness.

#Bhuvaneshwari #GoddessOfSpace #HreemMantra #DeepDrone #MeditationMusic #Mahavidya

tracks.file_note: Multiple versions including Cover, Remastered, Dark Power, and Dark Techno interpretations
tracks.youtube_title: Chhinnamasta Mantra for Kundalini & Transcending Ego | Powerful Tantric Chant | Prachanda Chandi
tracks.youtube_description:
Invoke the radical power of transformation with this intense Tantric chant to Goddess Chhinnamasta (Chinnamasta). This is a powerful mantra for advanced practitioners, designed to awaken Kundalini energy, destroy the ego, and cut through all obstacles and bonds.

Chhinnamasta, the fifth Mahavidya, is the 'Self-Decapitated Goddess.' Her startling form symbolizes the ultimate self-sacrifice: the cutting away of the ego (mistaken identity) to reveal the true Self. She is the power of direct, immediate spiritual awakening.

This piece is a powerful, rapid-fire percussive chant, reflecting the 'cutting' energy (Khanda Yoga) of the Goddess. The deep, grounding drone represents the Sushumna Nadi, the central channel of consciousness which she activates. This chant is a tool for profound spiritual liberation.

#Chinnamasta #Chhinnamasta #Kundalini #TantricMantra #Mahavidya #SanskritChant

tracks.youtube_title: Bhairavi Mantra (Tripura Bhairavi) | Chant for Inner Fire (Tapas) & Transformation | Warrior Goddess
tracks.youtube_description:
Ignite your inner fire (Tapas) with this fierce, percussive chant to Goddess Bhairavi. This mantra is a tool for profound transformation, burning away the ego, fear, and all illusions that block your spiritual path.

Bhairavi, the sixth Mahavidya, is the 'Warrior Goddess' of divine-fire and transformation. She is the raw, untamed energy of Kundalini, the disciplined heat that purifies the soul and destroys ignorance. This chant invokes her power to give you courage, clarity, and the strength to face all challenges.

This musical piece is a highly rhythmic, disciplined, and fiery percussive chant, embodying the very essence of 'Tapas.' The low, intense drone provides the foundation of heat and power, driving the spiritual transformation.

#BhairaviMantra #TripuraBhairavi #InnerFire #TantricChant #SpiritualAwakening #Mahavidya

tracks.youtube_title: Dhumavati Mantra: Chant of the Void | Deep Drone Meditation for Letting Go & Overcoming Sorrow
tracks.youtube_description:
Embrace the profound power of 'The Void' with this deep, meditative chant to Dhumavati, the Smoky Widow Goddess. This mantra is a powerful tool for letting go of the past, overcoming sorrow and loss, and finding the freedom that comes from ultimate detachment.

Dhumavati, the seventh Mahavidya, represents the state of reality before creation and after dissolution. She is the 'Goddess of the Void,' teaching us to find wisdom not in what we have, but in what we are willing to release. She is the embodiment of non-attachment and the ultimate liberator from all suffering.

This piece is a pure, deep, and smoky drone meditation. The continuous, low-frequency drone is the sound of the void (Shunya)—the eternal, silent space of pure potential. The sparse, low-register chant is the echo within that void. This track is ideal for deep meditation and releasing attachments.

#Dhumavati #GoddessOfTheVoid #LettingGo #MeditationMusic #DeepDrone #Mahavidya

tracks.youtube_title: Bagalamukhi Mantra to Silence Enemies & Win Legal Battles | Powerful Stillness Chant (Stambhana Shakti)
tracks.youtube_description:
Invoke the 'Stambhana Shakti' (The Power to Paralyze) of Goddess Bagalamukhi. This mantra is a potent weapon to silence enemies, stop gossip, neutralize negative intentions, and grant victory in legal battles and disputes.

Bagalamukhi, the eighth Mahavidya, is the divine power that brings all negativity to a sudden halt. She seizes the tongue and mind of the adversary, not with aggression, but with a profound, unmovable stillness.

This musical piece embodies 'Stambhana' (paralyzing stillness). The deep, unchanging, low-frequency drone is the sound of stillness itself—a powerful, stable force that stops all movement. The sharp, percussive chant is the focused command to stop. This is a meditation for protection and strategic victory.

#Bagalamukhi #BaglamukhiMantra #SilenceEnemies #MantraForCourtCase #TantricChant #Mahavidya

tracks.theological_identity: The Outcaste Goddess of Speech and Arts
tracks.youtube_title: Matangi Mantra (Tantric Saraswati) for Speech, Music & Arts | Powerful Percussive Chant for Creativity
tracks.youtube_description:
Unlock your creative and intellectual power with this potent chant to Goddess Matangi, the 'Tantric Saraswati'. This mantra is for artists, musicians, writers, and students, bestowing mastery over speech, music, and all arts.

Matangi, the ninth Mahavidya, is the 'Goddess of the Spoken Word.' She represents the power of divine speech (Vak) in all its forms, from the highest truth to 'outcaste' (Uchchishta) or 'leftover' knowledge. She grants the power to express the ineffable and to manifest thoughts into reality.

This track is a vibrant, rhythmic, and percussive Sanskrit chant, embodying the creative, expressive, and uninhibited flow of Vaikhari Vak (the spoken word). It is designed to stimulate the mind, break creative blocks, and empower your voice.

#Matangi #TantricSaraswati #MantraForCreativity #GoddessOfSpeech #SanskritChant #Mahavidya

tracks.youtube_title: Kamala Mantra (Tantric Lakshmi) for Wealth & Abundance | Deep Meditative Drone | Kamalatmika
tracks.youtube_description:
Align your vibration with prosperity and abundance with this beautiful, deep meditation on Goddess Kamala (Kamalatmika). This is the 'Tantric Lakshmi' mantra, a profound chant for attracting wealth, good fortune, material bliss, and spiritual fulfillment.

Kamala, the tenth and final Mahavidya, is the 'Lotus Goddess.' She is the Mahavidya form of Goddess Lakshmi, representing the unfolding of divine grace, beauty, and prosperity in the material world. She brings the cycle of the Ten Great Wisdoms to a close with auspiciousness, peace, and abundance.

This track is a deep, stable, and blissful low-frequency drone. This sound is the very vibration of abundance—a state of peaceful, resonant fullness. The gentle chant is an invocation for her divine grace to flow into your life. Ideal for daily wealth meditation and manifesting prosperity.

#KamalaMantra #TantricLakshmi #WealthMantra #MantraForAbundance #Kamalatmika #Mahavidya

bonus_tracks.name: Alakshmi
bonus_tracks.theological_identity: The Dark Goddess of Misfortune (Opposite of Lakshmi)
bonus_tracks.note: This is not part of the traditional Dasa Mahavidya. Alakshmi represents the removal of poverty consciousness and transformation of misfortune.

album_artwork.format: JPG or PNG, RGB color mode
album_artwork.notes: No text, logos, URLs, or prices

notes.multiple_versions: You have multiple versions of some tracks (especially Chinnamasta with 4 versions). You'll need to decide which version to use as the primary release for each platform.
notes.tripurasundari_note: You have two files with similar names but DIFFERENT content (different MD5 hashes): 'Tripurasundari.wav' and 'Tripursundari.wav'. Review both to determine which should be the primary version.
notes.alakshmi: The 'alaxmi.wav' file is not part of the traditional Dasa Mahavidya but could be released as a bonus track or separate single.
notes.isrc_codes: ISRC codes need to be obtained from your distributor when you upload.
notes.upc_code: UPC/EAN barcode for the album will be provided by your distributor.
